question: For all he cared, the game was as good as lost.
options: He did not care if the game was lost
He could not care less if the game was lost
He was almost certain that the game would be lost
He was afraid the game would be lost
The game was very good, and he cared very much about losing it

question: A basic object in this respect is the attainment of self sufficiency in food in about a decade.
options: Food will soon be sufficient for every body
We should aim at producing food for sale and consumption in ten years
We should be able to feed ourselves in five years
Our aim is to provide enough food for our needs
main: attainment of self sufficiency in food in about a decade

question: The manager said that unless the employees worked harder the factory would have to be closed. That manager said that ___
options: the employees were not working hard, and so the factory would be closed
the employees should not close early so that they could produce more
the factory was not productive because the employees were lazy
the factory would be shut if the employees did not increase their output
the factory was closed because the employees did not work hard enough
main: unless the employees worked harder the factory would have to be closed

question: The new employee is so humble and friendly that he will soon make himself popular.
He lost his voice momentarily.
options: for a brief period of time

question: I am yet to write the penultimate paragraph of my essay.
The Senate postponed the meeting indefinitely.
Since his father's death, Osita has not been able to cope with the tasks of a family head.
It is sheer foolhardiness for unarmed policemen to pursue armed robbers.
The judge came down heavily on the accused person in his judgement.
You are free to leave the hall.
The culprits will surrender their loot to the Customs officials.
"Watch it! You could be followed", said the robber.
Many candidates apply to read Law because it is a lucrative profession.
The pressman said that his interview with the president was off the record.
options: not written on government record books
written elsewhere other than in government records
